definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: In this article the origination and evolution of genera Houttuynia cordate is discussed as well.
sentences.chinese: 本文中還討論了蕺菜屬植物的起源演化。

sentences.english: The genetic diversity of cultivated species of Houttuynia cordate is slightly higher than that of natural ones.
sentences.chinese: 栽培蕺菜類羣遺傳多樣性略高於野生類羣。

definition: water spinach/ong choy/swamp cabbage/water convolvulus/water morning-glory/Ipomoea aquatica (botany)
Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜
Umbelliferae or Apiaceae, plant family containing carrot, coriander etc
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
